scripts.dev: rm -rf debug && mkdir debug && babel index.js -o debug/index.js --presets @babel/env && DEBUG=join-monster node -r dotenv/config debug/index.js
scripts.build: rm -rf .tmp && mkdir .tmp && mkdir -p dist && babel index.js -o .tmp/index.js --presets @babel/env && cp package.json .tmp/ && zip dist/dist.zip .tmp/* -j && rm -rf .tmp
scripts.test: rm -rf .tmp && mkdir .tmp && mkdir -p dist && babel index.js -o .tmp/index.js --presets @babel/env && cp package.json .tmp/ && zip dist/dist.zip .tmp/* -j && rm -rf .tmp
